title: How A Mission To Turn A Haitian Town Into A Surfing Destination Failed To Live Up To Its Promise
description:
Surfing was a profitable enterprise in Jacmel, as locals rented out boards and hosted lessons. But the projectâ€™s recent struggles reflect the difficulty of obtaining resources in a country battered by a series of catastrophes.
